name: 余盛延
objective: In this semester, we will read J. M. Coetzee's Foe. We will discuss the novel in detail in terms of its historical context, characterization, stories, themes, and style. Students taking this course are required to engage in a close reading of the novel and participate actively in class discussion. There will be some quizzes and a final exam.
